tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Piyush is an excellent doctor, my triplets were in the NICU for a month, 29 Th week born they weighed 1.3,1.4,1,5. His team at the NICU is also extremely efficient n extremely warm. Everyone there not just understands a new parents worry whose child is in the NICU but also treats your child as theirs. Cloudnine Hospital is a blessing for me n my family but Dr Piyush is highly recommend. Even now he is just a phonecall away. Extremely professional üòä
God bless. A heartfelt thanks to him n his team for bearing with irritating mothers like me üôè

tags: None
review:
Dr. Piyush Shah, is one of the nicest, humble and soft spoken doctor I have met. From the day I delievered at cloudnine hospital to now when my son is 9 months old he has only guided us. He is someone who puts you at ease( being the typical first time mother). He is also an excellent listener who will lost attention to the smallest questions you have. I come  all the way from new bombay for my follow ups and consultations. 

We am blessed and fortunate to have a doctor like Dr Piyush for our son.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I know Dr Piyush since last 3 years and since I met him for the first time after delivery of my third child, now all my kids are treated by him only. This is the level of trust and satisfaction I got from Dr Piyush. He has expertise in child health and he is one of the doctor who doesn‚Äôt prescribe too much medicine for kids. He believes in treating with ease and not with aggression. 
I would love to share this and also he is highly recommended dr in city. 
Super heroes are real and he is one of them. 
God bless him always üôèüôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Piyush is one of the most humble, down to earth person I have ever seen. His diagnosis of my son's illness has been impeccable. He does not believe in unnecessary strong medications. He is always ready to clear all queries/doubts however silly they might be and explains it patiently.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
* ****** **** **** ********* *** ***** ** ********** **** *** *** ******** **** ***** ** ******* ** *** ********* He doesn't understand that parents are conserned when it comes to their babies. ****** *** * ****** **** ** *** **** *** ***** **** ** ** ****** *** **** ** *** ********* I ignored his arrogance for 2 years but finally it crossed my patience level and decided to switch to a better option.

If you guys have questions regarding your kid then definitely be ready for some arrogance coming from his side.. 

As a parent of a 1st child I would prefer some one who clears my doubt and advice me to be clam and not to worry. This doctor does the reverse, he will not bother to clam you down instead will shout at you *** **** **** ******* ** **** ****** 

This change in doctors behaviour I have seen in past 4-6 months. ****** *** * ********* ** **** ** ********** **** *** *** ******** ***** Other wise he is a nice doctor.

tags: None
review:
It was a professional but friendly visit to Dr Piyush for our toddler son. 
We had the 18 month vaccination schedule also. Doctor himself administered the vaccination, which was a minor prickly pain of ephemeral moments for my son. Within seconds he was smiling and back to his naughtiness. 

No medication was prescribed for cough. Earlier consulted walking posture, which seemed behavioral and my son is fine now. 

Thanks Doc.

tags: None

review: I have known Dr Shah for the last 3 years for my 2 daughters. I would not recommend any other. Dr Shah is fantastic with the diagnosis, prognosis and treatment. In most cases, he would not recommend a medicine unless absolutely needed. He is always available and he is a great counsel. Absolutely love him. When we moved to Mumbai from Chicago, it was a task to find a doctor who we were used to back then; someone who could treat with minimal drug intervention. Luckily we found Dr Shah.
